name: TheDescent
description:
In 2020 you were the first "questionable individual" to take the space elevator for it's first ride.

NOTE: the game is unfinished, despite the apparent initial polish I was nursing a fever for more then half of the jam.
Stuff will eventually happen in the Jam submission release, but the time is 1:1 with real life due to a wrongly tweaked variable.  Thus, A non game jam entry correction will be made available for those curious enough to see this: https://mosthostla.itch.io/the-descent-errata

Final Upload started at
1 minute 57s from due date.
